title: transgressors
extract: transgressor. You can use the noun transgressor for anyone who violates a rule or oversteps a boundary. You are being a transgressor, for example, when you bring your barking dog into the library. A car thief is one kind of transgressor, a person who is actually breaking the law.
extract_html: transgressor. You can use the noun transgressor for anyone who violates a rule or oversteps a boundary. You are being a transgressor, for example, when you bring your barking dog into the library. A car thief is one kind of transgressor, a person who is actually breaking the law.
